title: Kha Zix is again in a disgusting stance
body:
He is back in the state he was released in: nuking down people faster than Rengar. Overbuffed his weaknesses too much to compensate for his weak state in comparison with the other junglers made him have no more weaknesses at all. He literally needs maximal 2 kills to be set up for the rest of the game and since he just needs early and mid game kills to win games and League gets shorter and shorter games where the fastest stump wins, Kha Zix is yet again a "Ban or lose" pick. Well dont Riot balance team

EDIT: Yes. Wards. Wards sure help getting E`d and taken down faster than u can press flash .

replies.body:
The key to winning against kha is grouping early.    If you have a strong team fight, they lose.  


Kha preys on loners and disorganization.
Not really. There are other junglers that can punish khazix very hard & if he doesn't get isolation during fights his damage output is greatly impacted.

What fights? He avoids fights and just ganks non stop to nuke down 3/4 of the lane health. Even if u manage to survive u are still going to lose 90% of your health cause of the mixed damage he does since literally every single spell of his except his ulti deal damage. Combine that with red smite and thunderlords and there will be noone be left to fight with
Mixed damage? Are you special? He does, like 15-190 additional magic damage based on level due to his passive... that's it.
WAAAH, IT HURTS AND I DONT LIKE IT! NERF NERF NERF NERF!

Faster than rengar?

Hyperbole at its best
I'd still rather use Rengar over Kha'Zix,....>_>,...
He's not broken lol he is just fine imo and before you call me a "kha zix ELO abuser" i don't even own the champ
